N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 308.2 - Payment for unused vacation

State Regulations

Any employee in the professional service who is eligible to
accrue vacation leave pursuant to Title A of Part 337 of this Chapter shall, upon nondisciplinary separation, resignation or retirement, or upon change of
the professional obligation from calendar year or college year to academic
year, be paid for any such unused vacation leave to his credit at the time of
such change in status, such payment to be computed on the basis of the annual
salary otherwise payable. In the case of death while in service, such amount
for unused vacation shall be paid to the deceased employee's estate or as
provided in section
1310
of the Surrogate's Court Procedure
